DEFECT.DESCRIPTION: The Drivers module has inferred that the current function is a DRIVER_INITIALIZE function: This is informational only. No problem has been detected.
The function being assigned or passed should be a DRIVER_UNLOAD function: Add the declaration 'DRIVER_UNLOAD DriverUnloadRoutine;' before the current first declaration of DriverUnloadRoutine.
